items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 305 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 62!

items.checkin_comment: Historical. One of Prague's first Indies, started well but turned into a tourist rip-off joint, can't say I'll miss them.
leicht würzig, leicht malzig, langer Abgang. Getestet am:28.12.2015

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 35 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 8!

user.bio: I like good beer & happy to travel to various places including Europe, USA and the rest of world if opportunity allows
CAMRA. I tick beers not taste them.
Rates with words sometimes also available under the same name on ratebeer.com

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 375 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 60 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 13!

items.checkin_comment: Был пил в 2006 пришел вчекинить раз есть время а ресторан совсем закрыт. Самый первый туристический пивовао что я посетил в праге.ушла эпоха
